load calc for shelby transaction
deliveries for shelby are calculated using the following formula :
vol total = ( monthly load - discount ) x ( 1 + discount ) ,
where monthly load is the monthly load which is the greater of the
total daily load or the contractual load , and discount is 0.075 for ctc natural gas , 0.025
